title: Poorvaaj and Jyothi step into the 'science of emotion' with Killer
description: The film’s first look blends human emotion with the evolving world of artificial intelligence
content:
Director Poorvaaj, who is best known for films like Shukra, Matarani Mounamidi, and A Masterpiece, is back with Killer. This time, he goes beyond genre limits to tell a story where emotion and artificial intelligence clash.
The first look of the film... [999 chars]

title: Meta forecasts bigger capital costs next year
description: Meta has forecast "notably larger" capital expenses next year thanks to investments in artificial intelligence, including aggressively building data centres to power its AI push.
content:

title: funded AI, Telegram devices to track Dalma elephants in Bankura
description: The forest department, with financial support from a Japanese agency, is set to deploy artificial intelligence to monitor the real-time movement of migratory elephant herds in Bankura, aiming to reduce recurring human-elephant conflicts.
content:

title: Blackstone chief’s warning on a new phase in data centre boom
description: Stephen Schwarzman thinks the artificial intelligence and data centre boom can power growth in Australia, as Kevin Rudd helps the NSW Government spruik its wares
content:
Head of global investment monolith Blackstone says Australia is well positioned to take advantage of the artificial intelligence revolution due to its energy and critical minerals resources and its very special relationship with the United States.

title: Despite high expectations, Trump didn't discuss Nvidia's Blackwell chip with Xi
description: U.S. President Donald Trump may have teased that he could discuss Nvidia's state-of-the-art artificial intelligence Blackwell chips with Chinese President Xi Jinping, but in the end, he said the topic didn't come up.
content: After meeting with Xi in South Korea on Thursday, Trump told reporters aboard Air Force One that semiconductors had been discussed and that China is "going to be talking to Nvidia and others about taking chips," but added: "We're not talking about th... [1865 chars]

title: PixVerse Joins UNU Global AI Network to Launch "AI for Good Academy"
description: SINGAPORE, Oct. 30, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Recently, the United Nations University Institute successfully hosted the Artificial Intelligence Conference. During the event, Generative AI video platform, PixVerse officially joined the United Nations University Global AI Network (UNU Global AI Network) and, together with the Network, launched the 'AI for Good Academy.'

title: Samsung Electronics' Net Profit Shoots Up 21% With The Chip Segment Posting Record Performance Amid The Artificial Intelligence Industry Boom
description: Net profit came to 12.22 trillion won ($8.6 billion) in the July-September period, up 21 per cent from the 10.1 trillion won tallied a year earlier, the company said in a regulatory filing.
content: Seoul: Samsung Electronics on Thursday said its net profit shot up 21 per cent in the third quarter from a year earlier with the chip segment posting a record performance amid the artificial intelligence (AI) industry boom. Net profit came to 12.22 t... [2681 chars]

title: YouTube will use AI to sharpen lower-resolution videos
description: Google's YouTube will use artificial intelligence to improve the visual clarity of many low-resolution videos on its platform when viewed on TV screens, the web and mobile devices.
content:
Google’s YouTube will use artificial intelligence to improve the visual clarity of many low-resolution videos on its platform when viewed on TV screens, the web and mobile devices.
